Reviews.Title: “One of the best basic hotels I have stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: TurnerJP
Reviews.Content: hotel stay reason business personal little basic theyre clean comfortable functional tv wifi available food taste value chef willing discuss cooking youre waiters reception staff willing assist welcome smile incredibly friendly hotel value close anagnina shopping centre plenty parking available stayed twice time week thoroughly enjoyed visits

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel at a reasonable price”

Reviews.Content: hotel located shopping nice comfortable bathrooms clean biggest breakfast variety food rarely replaced guests wait food bread pastry fresh industrial anda packed fruit canned hotel near anagnina metro station impossible walk station hotel sation bus metro takes 20 minutes central rome hotel hotel accessible price mind city center

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Rome short stay and Metro access.”
Reviews.Author: daveion
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights found location perfect close anagnina metro airport following driving sorrento hotel recent build integrated retail park facility hotel facilities modern clean helpful staff reliable shuttle anagnina metro breakfast buffet provided breads cakes fruit cereal cold meats cheese rest following day rome reasonable 2 nights recommend stays walking distance attached retail park

Reviews.Content: hotel appears hallways look nice trendy doors hall enlarged scene classic movie classic actor spacious tile flooring look feel clean bedding nice comfortable queen bed book twin sister didnt bother changing informed reception dont except views expected affordable pricing hotel location hotel buffet breakfast nice wide selection food including hot cold food hotel located anagnina region 20 minute metro ride termini station downside metro running 9pm public buses hotel 2min bus ride dont run 9pm abouts hotel own shuttle bus service times limited mention bus ride short 2 minutes anagnina metro station sad walk metro highway absolutely tried couple times arrive rome late night bus service termini anagnina taxi pocket 10euros hotel close proximity ciampino airport shuttle service staff hotel nice smile definitely recommend hotel people wish save money stay hustle bustle city centre
